title: Combining Data Frames Exercises
text:
Required packages and datasets
Run the code in the code chunk below to load the dataset happy_full.


Code
library(tidybiology)
data(happy)
data(happy_join_one)
data(happy_full)

title: Combining Data Frames Exercises
text:
Problem One

Take a look at the three data frames - happy, happy_join_one, and happy_full.



Code
```{r}
#| warning: false

glimpse(happy)

glimpse(happy_join_one)

glimpse(happy_full)
```

title: Combining Data Frames Exercises
text:
Problem Two
Combine happy and happy_join_one by row


Code
```{r}
#| warning: false
bind_rows(happy, happy_join_one)
```


# A tibble: 10 × 5
   country_name ladder_score   gdp social_support healthy_life_expectancy
   <chr>               <dbl> <dbl>          <dbl>                   <dbl>
 1 Iraq                 4.85  9.24          0.746                    NA  
 2 Comoros              4.29  8.03          0.626                    NA  
 3 Panama               6.18 10.4           0.896                    NA  
 4 Maldives             5.20  9.83          0.913                    NA  
 5 Spain                6.49 10.6           0.932                    NA

 7 Comoros             NA    NA            NA                        57.3
 8 Panama              NA    NA            NA                        69.7
 9 Maldives            NA    NA            NA                        70.6
10 Spain               NA    NA            NA                        74.7

title: Combining Data Frames Exercises
text:
Problem Three
Combine happy and happy_join_one by column. Note: Check to see if this is even possible.


Code
```{r}
#| warning: false
nrow(happy) == nrow(happy_join_one)

bind_cols(happy, happy_join_one)
```


[1] TRUE
# A tibble: 5 × 6
  country_name...1 ladder_score   gdp social_support country_name...5
  <chr>                   <dbl> <dbl>          <dbl> <chr>           
1 Iraq                     4.85  9.24          0.746 Iraq            
2 Comoros                  4.29  8.03          0.626 Comoros         
3 Panama                   6.18 10.4           0.896 Panama          
4 Maldives                 5.20  9.83          0.913 Maldives        
5 Spain                    6.49 10.6           0.932 Spain           
# ℹ 1 more variable: healthy_life_expectancy <dbl>

title: About Me
text: I am a third-year statistics major at Appalachian State University. After I graduate, I hope to either go to graduate school at NC State or start my career working in data analytics or data science. Last summer, I was an analytics intern at MDI in Hickory, NC. During my internship, I analyzed data using Placer.ai and SiteSeer to help small grocery store owners make better marketing, merchandising, and relocation/expansion decisions.

title: Projects
text: I will upload my STT 2860 projects here as I complete them
